summary: Email correspondence between attorney Sigrid McCawley and FBI Victim Services regarding logistics for a victim meeting in New York City on October 23, 2019. The emails discuss travel arrangements, security questionnaires, and coordination for a victim's attendance.

persons.name: Sigrid McCawley
persons.role: Attorney/Partner at Boies Schiller Flexner LLP
persons.context: Attorney representing an Epstein victim, coordinating with FBI Victim Services to arrange the victim's attendance at a meeting in New York.

persons.name: Amanda N. Young
persons.context: FBI employee in New York who is helping coordinate the victim meeting and copied on the email chain.

connections.description: Coordinating logistics for an Epstein victim to attend a meeting with FBI Victim Services in New York.

events.title: Epstein Victim Meeting in NY
events.description: A meeting organized by FBI Victim Services for Epstein victims to be briefed, held in a federal building in New York City.

locations: 401 E. Las Olas Blvd. Suite 1200 Fort Lauderdale, FL
keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division was organizing a meeting for Epstein victims in New York City on October 23, 2019.
Victims traveling more than 50 miles had transportation and lodging arranged at no cost, with potential mileage and parking reimbursement.
The meeting required security clearance due to being held in a federal building, necessitating personal information via an RSVP questionnaire.
Attorney Sigrid McCawley was actively facilitating a victim's attendance and coordinating with FBI personnel.
